downloadTitle: Skype for Business Server Subscription Edition RTM Hotfix 2 KB5065372
downloadDescription: This download is a required Baseline Build for In-Place Upgrade from Skype for Business Server 2019 to Subscription Edition
detailsSection: This Cumulative Update Download for Skype for Business Server Subscription Edition is described in the Knowledge Base article 5065372.
systemRequirementsSection:
This download works with the following program:
  • Skype for Business Server Subscription Edition
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download buttons and saving the files to your hard disk.
  2. Refer to Knowledge Base article 5065372 for installation details.
